message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $150 is the highest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
